TopicTitle: Landed and on a collision course xbox1

Articles.Content:
I have landed on the Mun with a basic lander with 4 landing legs. When I am safely on deck and try to go to the space station it gives me a warning and says I am on a collision course are you sure you want to proceed.  Keep in mind I am sitting perfectly still

If in do go to the space station and get back in the said craft, as soon as it loads the the gear compresses and I explode, every time. I don't even have time to throttle up and escape. 

I have a little landed science station and a rover right next to the landed craft and it gives me the same warning but they don't explode when I load into them. Is there a fix for this?

Edited July 19, 2016 by Army kerbal
Xbox one in title
Anyone else run into this?  Any thoughts from anyone?
Could be a terrain clipping issue. You could try increasing or decreasing your terrain detail settings.
I'll try this. Didn't know I couldn't do anything like that on xbox
I have no idea if you can actually change the terrain details on xbox. You can on PC so I assume you can too on xbox. Changing the terrain details on PC can sometimes solve this issue.
